Warga Perlu Ikut Serta Meminimalisasi Risiko Banjir
07 Nov 2019, 01:30 by Satira Yudatama
BANDUNG, (PR).- Meminimalisasi risiko banjir, Wakil Wali Kota Bandung Yana Mulyana kembali mengimbau kepada warga yang masih membuang sampah ke sungai, parit, dan saluran air lainnya agar mengubah perilaku. Selama masih ada warga yang masih membuang sampah di sembarang tempat, berbagai upaya Pemkot Bandung dalam mengatasi banjir tak bisa maksimal."Becermin dari informasi tim dari Dinas Pekerjaan Umum yang menemukan kasur yang turut menjadi penyebab Sungai Citepus meluap beberapa hari lalu, menunjukkan masih ada warga membuang sampah ke sungai, parit, atau saluran air lainnya," kata Yana di Balai Kota Bandung, Jalan Wastukencana, Rabu, 6 November 2019.Pemkot Bandung melalui PD Kebersihan, ucap Yana, menyediakan layanan tempat pembuangan sampah berukuran besar. Terdapat delapan titik pembuangan sampah berukuran besar, Jalan Sadang Serang Nomor 10, Jalan Pasir Impun 48, Jalan Sekelimus Barat 10, Jalan Cicukang 12, Jalan Raya Cibatu 1, Gang Kini 12 Pajajaran, Jalan Babakansari 64, Jalan Surapati 126.
Layanan pembuangan sampah berukuran besar itu setiap Jumat pukul 8.00-11.00. "Warga dapat memanfaatkan layanan itu secara gratis," kata Yana.Selain menyampaikan imbauan kepada warga, Yana juga berpesan kepada personel di bidang Penanggulangan Bencana (Dinas Kebakaran dan Penanggulangan Bencana) agar meningkatkan kesiapsiagaan, meminimalisasi tiap-tiap risiko. "Selain memetakan titik-titik berisiko, personel penanggulangan bencana perlu lebih intens menjalankan langkah kesiapsiagaan," ucap Yana.***

Residents Need To Participate In Minimizing Flood Risk
Nov 7 2019, 01:30 by Satira Yudatama
BANDUNG, (PR) .- Minimizing the risk of flooding, Deputy Mayor of Bandung Yana Mulyana again appealed to residents who are still throwing garbage into rivers, ditches and other waterways to change behavior. As long as there are residents who are still littering everywhere, the efforts of Bandung City Government in dealing with floods cannot be maximized. "Reflecting the information from the team from the Public Works Department who found the mattress that contributed to the Citepus River overflowing a few days ago, shows there are still residents throwing garbage into rivers, ditches, or other waterways, "Yana said at the Bandung City Hall, Jalan Wastukencana, Wednesday, November 6, 2019. Bandung City Government through PD Cleanliness, said Yana, providing large-scale landfill services. There are eight large garbage disposal points, Jalan Sadang Serang Number 10, Jalan Pasir Impun 48, Jalan Sekelimus Barat 10, Jalan Cicukang 12, Jalan Raya Cibatu 1, Gang Kini 12 Pajajaran, Jalan Babakansari 64, Jalan Surapati 126.
The large garbage disposal service is every Friday at 8:00 to 11:00. "Citizens can take advantage of the service free of charge," Yana said. In addition to appealing to residents, Yana also advised personnel in the field of Disaster Management (Fire and Disaster Mitigation Service) to increase preparedness, minimize each risk. "In addition to mapping risk spots, disaster management personnel need to be more intense in carrying out preparedness measures," Yana said. ***
